author: camolezi
body:
#### PR description:
Removed boost::ptr_map dependency.
The code should have the same behaviour and also similar performance. 

#### PR validation:
Passed on basic runTheMatrix test.

title: Remove boost::ptr_map dependency in DQM/EcalCommon
